sources.title: Their Last Bean (1939)
sources.description: A fox family is starving, the father with a bandaged foot and crutch. Hunters and dogs roar through and start hunting down one of the fox boys, but he not only outwits them he steals a turkey dinner from the men. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/their-last-bean-1939/

metadata.Plot: A fox family is starving, the father with a bandaged foot and crutch. Hunters and dogs roar through and start hunting down one of the fox boys, but he not only outwits them he steals a turkey dinner from the men.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
